replies.body: Well i was gonna buy my child some insurance but i think he'll be okay.

Don't worry. 

Buy your kid a {{item:3026}} . It's only 2750 gold one-time cost and has a 5 minute cooldown. Much more cost efficient than insurance.
Also, if you're that rich guy, you can sell your GA after it's been used and buy a new one so you don't have to wait 5 mintues!
